question: Erik ten Hag out as Manchester United manager?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Erik ten Hag ceases to be the manager of Manchester United for any length of time between May 14, 2024, and May 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

An announcement of his departure before this market's end date will immediately resolve this market to "Yes", regardless of when the announced departure goes into effect.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Manchester United, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Which Soccer Managers will be Sacked?

question: Tuchel out as Bayern Munich Manager?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Thomas Tuchel ceases to be the manager of Bayern Munich for any length of time between May 14, 2024, and May 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

An announcement of his departure before this market's end date will immediately resolve this market to "Yes", regardless of when the announced departure goes into effect.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Bayern Munich, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

Note: Previous announcements of Tuchel's planned departure at the end of the season will not be considered towards this markets resolution. Only a new announcement confirming Tuchel's departure will result in a "Yes" resolution.

events.title: Which Soccer Managers will be Sacked?

question: Will another candidate win the 2024 Dominican Republic presidential election?
description:
This market concerns the 2024 Dominican Republic presidential election. The first round of the Dominican Republic's 2024 presidential election is scheduled for May 19. If no presidential candidate receives more than 50% of the votes, a second round with the two candidates receiving the most votes will occur on June 30.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if any candidate other than Luis Abinader, Abel Martinez, or Leonel Fernandez wins the 2024 Dominican Republic presidential election. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market includes any potential second round. If the result of this election isn't known by December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, the market will resolve to "Yes".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the Dominican Republic; however, a consensus of credible reporting will also suffice.

question: Will a Republican win the popular vote and a Democrat win the Presidency?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if a Republican candidate wins the popular vote and a Democratic candidate wins the Presidency in the 2024 U.S. Presidential Election. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for the popular vote will be an overwhelming consensus of credible reporting as to who is the winner of the popular vote.

The resolution source for the winner of the Presidency will be the Associated Press, Fox News, and NBC. This market will resolve once all three sources call the race for the same candidate. If all three sources haven’t called the race for the same candidate by the inauguration date (January 20, 2025) this market will resolve based on who is inaugurated.

events.title: Who wins Presidency + Popular Vote?
events.description: This is a market on predicting which political party will win both the presidential election and the popular vote in the upcoming election.

question: Will a Democrat win the popular vote and a Republican win the Presidency?
description:

question: Will a 3rd party candidate win the popular vote or the Presidency?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if a candidate who is neither a Democrat nor a Republican wins either the popular vote or the Presidency in the 2024 U.S. Presidential Election. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for the popular vote will be an overwhelming consensus of credible reporting as to who is the winner of the popular vote.

The resolution source for the winner of the Presidency will be the Associated Press, Fox News, and NBC. This market will resolve once all three sources call the race for the same candidate. If all three sources haven’t called the race for the same candidate by the inauguration date (January 20, 2025) this market will resolve based on who is inaugurated.

question: Will Ilya join Anthropic?
description:
On May 14, Ilya Sutskever announced he was leaving OpenAI, and he would share his next endeavor in due time (see https://twitter.com/ilyasut/status/1790517455628198322).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Ilya Sutskever announces he is joining Anthropic by May 31, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

Note that if Ilya joins a subsidiary of the above company, this market will resolve to "Yes." This market may immediately resolve once Ilya Sutskever announces his new endeavor. 

The primary resolution source will be statements from Ilya.

question: Will Rafael Nadal win the 2024 French Open Men's Singles?
description:
The market will resolve to “Yes” if Rafael Nadal wins the 2024 French Open Men's Singles tournament. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”. 

If for any reason the tournament is cancelled or rescheduled to an end date after July 1, 2024, this market will resolve to "No".

If it can be definitively determined at any point that this player will not be the winner of the 2024 French Open Men's Singles based on the rules of the tournament, this market may immediately resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from The French Open/Roland Garros, including footage of the tournament, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will another player win the 2024 French Open Men's Singles?
description:
The market will resolve to “Yes” if any player other than Novak Djokovic, Jannik Sinner, Carlos Alcaraz, Daniil Medvedev, Alexander Zverev, Andrey Rublev, Casper Ruud, Stefanos Tsitsipas, Hubert Hurkacz, Grigor Dimitrov, or Rafael Nadal wins the 2024 French Open Men's Singles tournament. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”. 

If for any reason the tournament is cancelled or rescheduled to an end date after July 1, 2024, this market will resolve to "Yes".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from The French Open/Roland Garros, including footage of the tournament, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Trump + Biden debate on June 27 as planned?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Joe Biden and Donald Trump engage in a live, publicly-broadcast debate at any point on June 27, 2024 ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If it is announced that debate has been postponed or cancelled this market may immediately resolve to "No". 

Both in-person debates and virtual debates will count toward a "Yes" resolution for this market.

Changes to the June 27th debate such as a switch in the hosting network, or a debate that begins on June 27 and then ends early, will still result in a "Yes" resolution.

events.title: Trump + Biden debate on June 27 as planned?

question: Fantasy Top Hero arrested by end of May?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if any person with an account listed under the “Heroes” section on fantasy.top is arrested between May 15, 2024, 11:00 AM ET and May 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

An individual will be considered a Fantasy Top Hero if they have a Fantasy Top account listed under the “Heroes” section at the time of their arrest. 

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of reporting.

events.title: Fantasy Top Hero arrested by end of May?

question: Did Keith Gill (RoaringKitty) sell his X account?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if it is confirmed by May 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET that the Twitter account @TheRoaringKitty (https://twitter.com/TheRoaringKitty), believed to be owned by Keith Gill, was sold or transferred to another individual between the time of his 2021 post and his May 12 post. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The primary resolution source will be a public statement from Keith Gill confirming the sale or transfer of the account, however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Did Keith Gill (RoaringKitty) sell his X account?
